document.full_text: authorities in the united states, particularly in cash-strapped states, have not devoted enough resources to policing nonprofit groups like those involved in recent philanthropy controversies, experts say.
document.title: weak enforcement of rules on u.s. charities: experts
lines_and_colors: authorities in the united states, particularly in cash-strapped states, have not devoted enough resources to policing nonprofit groups like those involved in recent philanthropy controversies, experts say.
